Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.messages.clientToServerMessages.gameControllerMessages

Class SocketClientMessageDrawCardFromDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.messages.clientToServerMessages.SocketClientGenericMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.messages.clientToServerMessages.gameControllerMessages.SocketClientMessageDrawCardFromDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SocketClientMessageDrawCardFromDeck extends SocketClientGenericMessage
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intent to draw a card from a deck of cards.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketClientMessageDrawCardFromDeck

      public SocketClientMessageDrawCardFromDeck(Player player, DeckType deck)
      Constructs a new message that requires drawing a card from the deck of cards. This message is flagged to be processed by the game controller of the application.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      deck - The deck from which the card is drawn.
